overview: Husband Marc Wallace and wife Ona Zee have been having sex three times a week for six months in an effort to get her pregnant, but have had no success. So they seek out medical advice. Dr. Peter North gets us to the punchline - Marc and Ona know everything they know about sex from watching sex movies.
tagline: Ona's Back! Doin' Everything From A to "Zee"
title: Immaculate Erection
